spiritsExplanation:
The workout's spirit leans towards 'Structured & Disciplined' with a score of 0.75 due to the highly systematic approach and specific routines mentioned in the top comments and description, such as "Commando One Arm Negatives" and "Ring Curls". These exercises suggest a methodical progression and technical precision typical of structured calisthenics routines. The title and description highlight terms like "effective calisthenics workout" and "systematic approach," further supporting this classification.

The 'High-Energy & Intense' spirit is also relevant with a score of 0.7, as the workout includes challenging exercises (e.g., "One Arm Chin Up Hold," "Head Bangers") that are physically demanding, causing significant exertion and muscle soreness, as noted by user comments.

'Sport & Agility' is considered to a lesser extent (score 0.45) due to the emphasis on dynamic calisthenics moves that require agility and body control, though sport-specific training is not the main focus here. The tags and description lack explicit references to sports-specific skills, limiting the strength of this classification. Other spirits such as 'Flow & Rhythm' and 'Soothing & Restorative' are excluded, as the workout is more focused on intensity and discipline rather than smooth movement or relaxation.
